name: Neo-Runner
description:
Neo-Runner is a fast-paced, 3D platformer which combines platforming elements such as running, grappling, and wall-running with First-Person Shooter mechanics.

Run. Shoot. Survive.

Jerry the (evil?) A.I has trapped you in a simulation which seems endless. As test subject 1-0-3D, are you able to escape and discover reality?

In Neo-Runner, you will wall-run, grapple, sprint and boost-pad your way to victory! (OK, maybe you will die a few times, but you get the point).

Who's behind Neo-Runner?
  • Lewis Moholt | Team Lead, Programmer, Level Design, Sound Effects. @LinkedIn | @Website | @YouTube
  • Rachel Thomas | Programmer, Level Design. @LinkedIn
  • Joshua Price | Programmer, Level Design. @LinkedIn
  • Joseph Morgan | 3D Artist, Level Design. @LinkedIn
  • Barbara Lo Giudice | 3D Artist. @LinkedIn | @Website | @YouTube
  • Noah Curtis | Music. @Website
Controls (Keyboard/Mouse)

Esc - Pause Game

W, A, S, D - Movement

Space - Jump

F - Interact/Pickup

R - Reload

Left-Click - Shoot weapon

Right-Click (Hold) - Shoot grapple hook

Install Instructions
  • Download the .zip file below.
  • Extract the folder.
  • Open the .exe file to run.
  • Have fun! =]
Feedback/Bug Reports

Neo-Runner is still in a development state. If you have 5 minutes spare and would like to provide us with your invaluable feedback or bug reports, please report them using the following link: https://forms.gle/VgBooWpdmzG5wQBFA

                           Your feedback is much appreciated!

Post your Speed-Runner Scores Below! 

Have an impressive Speed-Runner score you want to share with others? We'd love to hear your time records in the comments below! Or if you just want to share your thoughts on the game, please let us know in the comments below!
